entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
